content.question: The example of an ancient Arabian state that traded extensively and controlled territories on the East African coast can best be used as evidence of

choices.label: the contributions of East Africa to the development of Eurasian religions
the long-term continuities in state building in coastal East Africa
the importance of the East African coast in the development of African national identities
the technological and logistical challenges faced by Eurasian merchants trying to reach the East African coast

content.answer: the long-term continuities in state building in coastal East Africa

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
